question: My name is irene. i am twenty one years old. i am tall and slim. my hair is black and curly. my nose is sharp and my skin is white. i work for a big company in semarang. my job is to make a minute in meeting, type letters, manage the director’s daily agenda and select guest who want to meet my director. what does her hair look like?

related_questions.question:
5. i saw an accident last night. somebody ……..an ambulance but nobody …… so the ambulance ………..    a. called – was injured – wasn’t needed
b. called – injured – didn’t need 
c. was called – was injured – wasn’t needed 
d. called – injured – wasn’t needed

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

Penjelasan:

I saw an accident last night. Somebody called an ambulance but nobody was injured so the ambulance wasn't needed. (Aku melihat sebuah kecelakaan tadi malam. Seseorang menelepon sebuah ambulans namun tidak ada yang terluka sehingga ambulans tersebut tidak diperlukan)

Karena dia di masa lalu, maka kita gunakan simple past Dan past perfect.

V1 V2 V3

Call Called Called

  • Untuk kesatu, kita gunakan Called karena kalimat tersebut lebih sesuai dengan kata called.
  • Untuk kedua, kita gunakan Was Injured karena pada bagian tersebut lebih logis bila diartikan sebagai "tidak ada yang terluka/nobody was injured" dibandingkan "tidak ada terluka/nobody injured"
  • Untuk ketiga, kita gunakan Wasn't Needed karena artinya adalah tidak diperlukan sedangkan jawaban yang tidak tepat adalah didn't need karena artinya tidak perlu.

Jadi jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.
